# My powercoders Repo
PowerCoders Files PowerCoders Files PowerCoders 

## lists
### how to do lists
* first item 
* second item 
  * another item 
* first item 

1. first item
2. second item
3. etc...

## formating text
you can do bold like **this** and like __this__

you can do ITALIC like *this* and like _this_

you can do STRIKETHROUGH like ~~this~~


## blockquotes
> some quoted  text...<br>
> some quoted  text...<br>
> some quoted  text...<br>
> some quoted  text...<br>

## code format~
**` <p>some para content</p> `** - a code line

``` shell

$ cd dir1/
$ pwd
/c/Users/User/dir
```

``` js
var bob = 3; 
let dada = 'no more !';
```

https://www.markdownguide.org   - normal link
